___state.description: The state value, if one was passed with the request. Clients must validate the value before proceeding.

___expires_in.description: Expiration time of the access token in seconds since the response was generated.

___code.description: The OAuth 2.0 authorisation code. Required to obtain the ID token and token from the token endpoint.

___token_type.description: The OAuth 2.0 token type, set to bearer.

___access_token.description: The OAuth 2.0 access token. Required for the UserInfo endpoint and other authorised protected resources.
